title: Season 2, Episode 6: Racism towards Latinos: Past, present, and future
itunes:author: Neil Foley, Susannah Crockford, Chris Gilson, and Sophie Donszelmann
description: Contributor(s): Neil Foley, Susannah Crockford, Chris Gilson, and Sophie Donszelmann | The current US president is not the first American leader to use inflammatory rhetoric about Latinos and push anti-immigration policies, but Donald Trump’s presidency has certainly brought these issue to the forefront of American politics. This episode we’re diving into the fear, resentment, and history behind racism towards Latinos, and in doing so, we’ll see that this is far from a recent phenomenon.
